福岡に引っ越しちまってもさ―
google_translated:
Even if it is not a burst linker
Moving to Fukuoka

en_text:
there are plenty of other games
in the VR world, right?
jp_text:
ＶＲワールドは
加速世界だけじゃないだろう？
google_translated:
VR World
Isn't it only the accelerated world?

en_text:
So let me know of any
good online VR games.
jp_text:
何か いいオンラインＶＲゲーム
知ってたら 教えてくれよ
google_translated:
Something good online VR game
Tell me if you know

en_text:
Something I can play with him
for a long time.
jp_text: ずっと長く遊べるような
google_translated: It seems to play for a long time

en_text:
You can take any of the ones
I've got here.
jp_text:
じゃあ うちにあるの
どれでも持っていっていいよ
google_translated:
Well then
You can bring anyone

en_text: They tend to all be the same type, but...
jp_text: アハハ…

en_text: What's this?
jp_text: これ 僕がもらっていいの？

en_text: Um, it's to thank you.
jp_text: まあ 何だ その… 礼だよ

en_text: Give it back if you don't want it!
jp_text: んだよ！　いらねえなら返せよ！
google_translated: I'm sorry!I will return if I don't!

en_text: No, I want it!
jp_text: もらう！　もらうよ！

en_text: Really delicious.
jp_text: すごく おいしい

en_text:
Why the hell are you crying,
you idiot?!
jp_text:
あ… あんた 何泣いてんだよ
バ… バカかよ！
google_translated:
Oh ... I'm getting crying
Ba ... idiot!

en_text: Either eat or cry, but don't do both!
jp_text:
もう 食うか泣くか
どっちかにしろよ！
google_translated:
Do you cry or cry
Let's do it!

en_text: Next time, "Violation."
jp_text:
（黒雪姫）
次回…

en_text: An intruder appears.
jp_text: 現れる侵入者

en_text:
A new season arrives
and a new battle begins.
jp_text:
新たな季節が訪れ
新たな戦いが始まる
google_translated:
A new season visits
A new battle begins
